name: arcadedb-studio-e2e

scripts.test: npm run start:server && playwright test; npm run stop:server
scripts.test:ui: npm run start:server && playwright test --ui; npm run stop:server
scripts.test:headed: npm run start:server && playwright test --headed; npm run stop:server
scripts.test:debug: npm run start:server && playwright test --debug; npm run stop:server
scripts.test:chromium: npm run start:server && playwright test --project=chromium; npm run stop:server
scripts.test:firefox: npm run start:server && playwright test --project=firefox; npm run stop:server
scripts.test:webkit: npm run start:server && playwright test --project=webkit; npm run stop:server
scripts.test:mobile: npm run start:server && playwright test --project=mobile-chrome; npm run stop:server
scripts.test:navigation: npm run start:server && playwright test --grep="Navigation Tests"; npm run stop:server
scripts.test:auth: npm run start:server && playwright test --grep="Authentication"; npm run stop:server
scripts.test:api: npm run start:server && playwright test --grep="API Integration"; npm run stop:server
scripts.test:ui-components: npm run start:server && playwright test --grep="UI Components"; npm run stop:server
scripts.test:database: npm run start:server && playwright test --grep="Database Interaction"; npm run stop:server
scripts.test:query: npm run start:server && playwright test --grep="Query.*Data Visualization"; npm run stop:server
scripts.test:graph: npm run start:server && playwright test --grep="Graph Visualization"; npm run stop:server
scripts.start:server: docker run -d --name arcadedb-test --rm -p 2480:2480 -p 2424:2424 -p 6379:6379 -p 5432:5432 -p 8182:8182 --env JAVA_OPTS="-Darcadedb.server.rootPassword=playwithdata -Darcadedb.server.defaultDatabases=Beer[root]{import:https://github.com/ArcadeData/arcadedb-datasets/raw/main/orientdb/OpenBeer.gz} -Darcadedb.server.plugins=Redis:com.arcadedb.redis.RedisProtocolPlugin,MongoDB:com.arcadedb.mongo.MongoDBProtocolPlugin,Postgres:com.arcadedb.postgres.PostgresProtocolPlugin,GremlinServer:com.arcadedb.server.gremlin.GremlinServerPlugin" arcadedata/arcadedb:latest && npm run wait:server

author: ArcadeDB Team
description: End-to-End tests for ArcadeDB Studio frontend using Playwright
